skills-whm-cpanel.description: Enterprise WHM/cPanel MCP Server - 48 tools for hosting management

instructions.pt-BR:
Para usar este MCP no Cursor AI (HTTP Streamable):
1. Abra Cursor Settings (Ctrl/Cmd + ,)
2. Navegue para 'AI' -> 'MCP Servers'
3. Clique em 'Add MCP Server'
4. Cole esta configuração
5. Substitua YOUR_WHM_MCP_API_KEY_HERE pelo valor de WHM_MCP_API_KEY do .env
6. Salve e reinicie o Cursor

Endpoint: http://mcp.servidor.one:3200/mcp
Protocolo: MCP 2024-11-05 (Streamable HTTP)

Exemplos de uso:
- 'Listar todas as contas cPanel'
- 'Criar conta para dominio exemplo.com'
- 'Adicionar registro DNS A para www.exemplo.com'
- 'Verificar status do servidor WHM'
- 'Ler últimas 100 linhas do log Apache'

Tools disponíveis: 48 ferramentas para gerenciamento WHM/cPanel
Categoria: Account Management, DNS, Domain Management, Monitoring, Files, System

Safety Guard: Para operações destrutivas forneça MCP_SAFETY_TOKEN como confirmationToken
instructions.en:
To use this MCP in Cursor AI (HTTP Streamable):
1. Open Cursor Settings (Ctrl/Cmd + ,)
2. Navigate to 'AI' -> 'MCP Servers'
3. Click 'Add MCP Server'
4. Paste this configuration
5. Replace YOUR_WHM_MCP_API_KEY_HERE with WHM_MCP_API_KEY from .env
6. Save and restart Cursor

Endpoint: http://mcp.servidor.one:3200/mcp
Protocol: MCP 2024-11-05 (Streamable HTTP)

Usage examples:
- 'List all cPanel accounts'
- 'Create account for domain example.com'
- 'Add DNS A record for www.example.com'
- 'Check WHM server status'
- 'Read last 100 lines of Apache log'

Available tools: 48 tools for WHM/cPanel management
Category: Account Management, DNS, Domain Management, Monitoring, Files, System

Safety Guard: For destructive operations provide MCP_SAFETY_TOKEN as confirmationToken
